lines.text: If his brain's ran down, how can he talk?
It happens to people all the time, Jack.
Your Majesty! SHE has returned to Oz!
Good, good. Keep an eye on her.
[the Nome pauses, hesitant]
Well, what's the matter? What is it?
She has a... chicken with her.
A CHICKEN?
[regarding headless statues]
Look, Billina, these ones have lost their heads.
Now, that's what I call just plain carelessness
We come all this way to see a bunch a stiffs.
Some place for a chicken coop! How big is this pond anyway?
I don't think it's a pond, Billina.
[gets up and looks around]
I guess it is a pond.
Hmm, told you so.
Where did all the rest of the water go?
Yeah, where did Kansas go? Ohh, this is some place for a chicken coop.
When did you learn to talk anyway? I thought hens could only cluck and cackle.
Strange, ain't it? How's my grammar?
I have always valued my lifelessness.
You'll be sorry for treating me like this! I'm a TERRIBLE fierce person!
I am only a machine. So I can not be sorry or happy, no matter what happens.

[Dorothy, Tik Tok, Bellina and Jack are all flying on the Gump]
Mr. Gump, can't you fly any faster?
Not unless one of you wants to jump off.
Why doesn't the sofa go first.
But I don't have anything to touch with.
You can use your antlers.
I should have quit when I was a head.

[On her final guess Dorothy is about to guess on a bird statue, but then spots and emerald and chooses that instead]
Oz!

[Restored from ornament form]
Dorothy!

[In his throne room the Nome King hears the echo of the scarecrow saying "Dorothy"]
Smudge and blazes!

[Back in ornament room]
Scarecrow!
Dorothy.
[the two embrace]
You were green.
What?
You were a green ornament.
I was?
Maybe people from Oz turn into green ornaments.
If I had a stomach, I *know* I would be sick!
What is this, a man or a melon?
A pumpkin, if you please.

You will be rather attractive... one day. Not at all beautiful, you understand, but you have a certain... prettiness. Different from my other heads. I believe I'll lock you in the tower for a few years till your head is ready. And then I'll take it.
I believe you will NOT!
Lie down.
I'd like to sit up, if I may.
What did your aunt tell you?
To do what you told me, Miss Wilson.
Then, lie down.
[the attendants are strapping Dorothy to the stretcher]
Why do you have to tie me down?
So that you don't fall off.
I came all the way from the farm on a buggy and I didn't fall off.
[They start to wheel Dorothy down the hall]
Did I hear somebody scream earlier?
No.
[They wheel Dorothy through some double doors. Dr. Worley is adjusting his machine]
Hello, Dorothy. How are you?
I wish I wasn't tied down.
Why did they bring you here, Dorothy?
Because I can't sleep, and I talk about a place that I've been to, but nobody believes that it exists.
And how did you come back from... Oz?
With my ruby slippers.
How did they work?
You put them on and you click your heels three times, and you say "There's no place like home".
Dorothy, where are those slippers now?
I lost them. They fell off on the way back.
There's no place like home.

This is the old house! The one the tornado blew away. This is how I got into Oz the first time. That used to be my bedroom, and in there was the kitchen... And that's where I landed on the Wicked Witch of the East. But where all the munchkins?
Oh no...
That's just a yellow brick.
No, Billina. This was the yellow brick road. It leads to the Emerald City!
You're so beautiful. What's your name?
Ozma.
MOM! My *real* mom!
[he faints into the crowd]
Don't you know that eggs are poison?
Poison, indeed!
Poison... poison to... nomes.
These Wheelers can be tricky customers.
Come here... chicken!

[the trio are assembling the Gump together, but Tik-Tok's brains are running down]
Here's a broom Tik-Tok, it'll make a great tail.
Excellent. Now we must Gump the head at the front, and tie Jack's feet together.
Right. Tie my feet together
[Jack does so]
Bring that mantlepiece to the desk, and then annoint the palms!
Right, annoint the-
[Jack falls due to his feet being tied]
That is right Jack. Left, right, wrong.
What are you talking about Tik-Tok?
Little girl, squaking eggs, make chicken fly the coop.
Coop?
You have to come out sooner or later. And when you do, we'll tear you into little pieces and throw you in the deadly desert!
I haven't done anything to you.
Isn't that a stolen lunch pail in your hand? Isn't that a chicken in there with you? The Nome King doesn't allow chickens anywhere in Oz!
Who's the Nome King?
Who is the Nome King?
[laughs hysterically]
The last thing I remember is walking through the forest and hearing a loud noise. Now, here I am flying through the air. What am I anyway?
You're a... a thing, with a Gump's head on it. We built you and brought you to life so you can take us to the Nome King; to rescue the Scarecrow.

[as Mombi]
... Doooorothy Gaaale!

[to Dorothy]
May I call you Mom, even if it isn't so?
The clinic was hit by lightning and it burned to the ground. Everybody was rescued, except Dr. Worley. He ran in to rescue his machines.
I think Number 4 will do for this afternoon.

[as Mombie]
Where's my powder of life?
Please, let me go. Please, please, let me go. Pleeaase, let me go! Let me go!
All right Tik Tok, let him go.

[to Wheeler]
Behave yourself now!
I WILL behave! I'll-I'll behave!
[Tik Tok lets him go]

[Wheeler laughs]
Behave!
[skates away]

[laughing]
Behave... I'll be... - ohhps!
[falls]

[laughing]
YOU BEHAVE!
[laughing]
...there's no sign of the CHICKEN!

Patented Clockwork Mechanical Man. Does everything but live. For Thinking, wind number 1 under left arm. For Speaking, wind number 2 under right arm. For Walking & Action, wind number 3, middle of back. Guaranteed to work perfectly for a thousand years.
Aww, you don't believe that do ya?
I don't know. I'll wind him up and we'll see.

[everybody's falling off the Gump and out of the sky]
I'm sorry, Mom!
It's okay, Jack, it can't be helped now!
